    fastlane_user_dir() click to toggle source

    A directory that's being used to user-wide fastlane configs This directory is also used for the bundled fastlane Since we don't want to access FastlaneCore from spaceship this method is duplicated in spaceship/client.rb

    # File fastlane_core/lib/fastlane_core/module.rb, line 26
def self.fastlane_user_dir
  path = File.expand_path(File.join(Dir.home, ".fastlane"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(path) unless File.directory?(path)
  return path
end
    reset_session() click to toggle source 
    # File fastlane_core/lib/fastlane_core/module.rb, line 18
def self.reset_session
  @session = nil
end
    session() click to toggle source

    Session is used to report usage metrics. If you opt out, we will not send anything. You can confirm this by observing how we use the environment variable: FASTLANE_OPT_OUT_USAGE Specifically, in FastlaneCore::AnalyticsSession#finalize_session Learn more at docs.fastlane.tools/#metrics

    # File fastlane_core/lib/fastlane_core/module.rb, line 14
def self.session
  @session ||= AnalyticsSession.new
end
